title: Employee Tracker

description.description: add departments, roles and employees to the database, view those different categories and update a chosen Employee's role. For bonus work I was also able to make it so that the user could update the chosen employee's manager and delete data from any of the three chosen categories (employee, role or department).

technologies: Technologies Used: MySQL, NodeJS, Javascript, Jquery

title: Team Website Builder

description.description: Application that will begin with a series of questions and prompts, and upon answering them the user will be presented with a polished html that will contain their entered information inside of the output folder.

technologies: Technologies Used: NodeJS, Javascript, Jquery, NPMs

title: ReadMe Builder

description.description: The user will access via the command line, fill out the required questions, and then they will be presented with a polished, professional Readme for their desired project.

technologies: Technologies Used: NodeJS, Javascript, Inquirer npm
